dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 4486 IH: To amend section 1908 of title 41, United States Code, to exempt certain contracts from the periodic inflation adjustments to an acquisition-related dollar threshold.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Vel√°zquez introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To amend section 1908 of title 41, United States Code, to exempt certain contracts from the periodic inflation adjustments to an acquisition-related dollar threshold.

section.header: Exemption of certain contracts from the periodic inflation adjustments to the acquisition-related dollar threshold
section.text: Subparagraph (B) of section 1908(b)(2) of title 41, United States Code, is amended by inserting 3131 to 3134, after sections.
